001package reversi;
002
003import java.util.Arrays;
004import java.util.List;
005
006public class Example extends Object {
007    public static void main(String[] args) {
008        Integer aMaxColumn = 8;
009        Integer aMaxRow = 8;
010        Table aTable = new Table(aMaxColumn, aMaxRow);
011        Player aPlayerA = new Player(aTable, "a");
012        Player aPlayerB = new Player(aTable, "b");
013        Player aPlayerC = new Player(aTable, "c");
014        Player aPlayerD = new Player(aTable, "d");
015        List<Player> players = Arrays.asList(aPlayerA,aPlayerB,aPlayerC,aPlayerD);
016        Judge aJudge = new Judge(aTable, players);
017        Model aModel = new Model(aJudge,"Reversi");
018
019        aModel.open();
020        return;
021    }
022}
